Master of Computer Applications (MCA)

The Master of Computer Applications (MCA) program is a professional postgraduate course designed to equip students with a comprehensive understanding of computer science and its applications. Our curriculum focuses on modern programming languages, software development, data science, and network technologies, preparing students for high-demand roles in the IT industry.

Students gain practical experience through hands-on projects, internships, and a capstone project. Our experienced faculty and state-of-the-art labs provide a conducive environment for learning and innovation.
